Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ọrọ̀-ajé ìya eléso, ṣé ajé wá?
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ọrọ-aje iya eleso, ṣe aje wa?

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ọrọ̀-ajẹ́ ẹ̀yin ìya ọlọ́jà.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ọrọ-ajẹ ẹyin iya ọlọja.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ẹwà o ìya onídìrí.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ẹwa o iya onidiri.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìjókòó o, ẹ sì kú ẹwà.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ijokoo o, ẹ si ku ẹwa.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ẹwà ẹ̀yin ọ̀ṣọ́rọ́ ọlọ́mọge.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ẹwa ẹyin ọṣọrọ ọlọmọge.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀ ń fírna ni? ẹ kú ẹwà o.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ n firna ni? ẹ ku ẹwa o.

Original Sentence: Ojú yín mà gúnrégé kẹ, ẹ kú ẹwà.
Modified Sentence: Oju yin ma gunrege kẹ, ẹ ku ẹwa.

Original Sentence: Ẹ káábọ̀, ẹ kú iṣẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ kaabọ, ẹ ku iṣẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú iṣẹ́ o bàba alágbẹ̀dẹ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku iṣẹ o baba alagbẹdẹ.

Original Sentence: Ṣé ẹ ti ṣetán? Ẹ kú iṣẹ́ o.
Modified Sentence: Ṣe ẹ ti ṣetan? Ẹ ku iṣẹ o.

Original Sentence: Ẹ ti ẹ̀ ti gbìyàjú, ẹ kú iṣẹ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ti ẹ ti gbiyaju, ẹ ku iṣẹ.

Original Sentence: Mo ṣẹ̀ ní kí n wá wòyín ni, ẹ kú iṣẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Mo ṣẹ ni ki n wa woyin ni, ẹ ku iṣẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ pẹ̀lẹ́ o, ẹ kú àmúmọ́ra.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ pẹlẹ o, ẹ ku amumọra.

Original Sentence: Mo báa yín kẹ́dùn, ẹ kú àmúmọ́ra.
Modified Sentence: Mo baa yin kẹdun, ẹ ku amumọra.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ọrọ̀ èyàn, ẹ sì kú àmúmọ́ra.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ọrọ eyan, ẹ si ku amumọra.

Original Sentence: Ìròyìn náà ṣẹ̀ kàn mi lára ni, ẹ kú àmúmọ́ra.
Modified Sentence: Iroyin naa ṣẹ kan mi lara ni, ẹ ku amumọra.

Original Sentence: O kú àmúmọ́ra ti bàbá rẹ.
Modified Sentence: O ku amumọra ti baba rẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ṣíṣe o, owó lẹ ná o.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ṣiṣe o, owo lẹ na o.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ṣíṣe, Ọlọ́run á fọ́pọ̀ rọ́pò.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ṣiṣe, Ọlọrun a fọpọ rọpo.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ṣíṣe, èrè á pọ̀ níbẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ṣiṣe, ere a pọ nibẹ.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀gá mi, ẹkú ìpalẹ̀mọ́, ẹ kú ṣíṣe.
Modified Sentence: Ọga mi, ẹku ipalẹmọ, ẹ ku ṣiṣe.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ṣíṣe ìyàwo ọmọ yín.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ṣiṣe iyawo ọmọ yin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àfọkànsìn, mo mọ rírì yín.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku afọkansin, mo mọ riri yin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun, ẹ kú àfọkànsìn.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun, ẹ ku afọkansin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àfọkànsìn ẹ̀yin ọmọ ẹgbẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku afọkansin ẹyin ọmọ ẹgbẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àfọkànsìn, mi ò mọ bí mi ò bá ṣe dúpẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku afọkansin, mi o mọ bi mi o ba ṣe dupẹ.

Original Sentence: Mi ò mọ̀ pé ẹ tún lè rántí, ẹ kú àfọkànsìn.
Modified Sentence: Mi o mọ pe ẹ tun le ranti, ẹ ku afọkansin.

Original Sentence: Ọlọ́hun ṣeun o, ẹ kú ewu àárẹ̀ màmá.
Modified Sentence: Ọlọhun ṣeun o, ẹ ku ewu aarẹ mama.

Original Sentence: A dúpẹ́ pé ara yín ti yá, ẹ kú ewu àárẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: A dupẹ pe ara yin ti ya, ẹ ku ewu aarẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ewu àárẹ̀, kò ní kù lẹ́yìn.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ewu aarẹ, ko ni ku lẹyin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ewu àárẹ̀, a dúpẹ́ ẹ ò bá a lọ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ewu aarẹ, a dupẹ ẹ o ba a lọ.

Original Sentence: Inú mi dùn pé ẹ tún fi ẹsẹ̀ ara yín rìn, ẹ kú ewu àárẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Inu mi dun pe ẹ tun fi ẹsẹ ara yin rin, ẹ ku ewu aarẹ.

Original Sentence: Iṣẹ́ ńlá lẹ ṣe o, ẹ kú ìgbìyànjú.
Modified Sentence: Iṣẹ nla lẹ ṣe o, ẹ ku igbiyanju.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìgbìyànjú ẹ̀yin akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wa.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku igbiyanju ẹyin akẹkọọ wa.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìgbìyànjú, ọlọ́hun á dé ìgbìyànju yín ládé.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku igbiyanju, ọlọhun a de igbiyanju yin lade.

Original Sentence: Mi ò mọ̀ pé ó lè rẹwà báyìí, ẹ kú ìgbìyànjú.
Modified Sentence: Mi o mọ pe o le rẹwa bayii, ẹ ku igbiyanju.

Original Sentence: O káre ọmọ, o kú ìgbìyànjú.
Modified Sentence: O kare ọmọ, o ku igbiyanju.

Original Sentence: Ẹ káábọ̀, ẹ kú ọjà.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ kaabọ, ẹ ku ọja.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ọjà o, ṣájé wá?
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ọja o, ṣaje wa?

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ọjà ìya oní gaàrí wa.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ọja iya oni gaari wa.

Original Sentence: Ìyá lájé wa, ẹ kú ọjà.
Modified Sentence: Iya laje wa, ẹ ku ọja.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìrìn, ẹ sì ku ọjà.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku irin, ẹ si ku ọja.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àfaradà, gbogbo rẹ̀ yóò dáa.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku afarada, gbogbo rẹ yoo daa.

Original Sentence: Mo kíi yín, ẹ kú àfaradà.
Modified Sentence: Mo kii yin, ẹ ku afarada.

Original Sentence: Kò rọrùn rárá o, ẹ̀yin lẹ kú àfaradà.
Modified Sentence: Ko rọrun rara o, ẹyin lẹ ku afarada.

Original Sentence: Má bìnú ayaà mi, o kú àfaradà.
Modified Sentence: Ma binu ayaa mi, o ku afarada.

Original Sentence: Bá mi ṣe wọ́n pẹ̀lẹ́, wọ́n kú àfaradà.
Modified Sentence: Ba mi ṣe wọn pẹlẹ, wọn ku afarada.

Original Sentence: Ó tọ́jọ́ mẹ́ta, ẹ kú àbéére ẹni.
Modified Sentence: O tọjọ mẹta, ẹ ku abeere ẹni.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ọjọ́ gbọọrọ, ẹ sì kú àìbéére ẹni.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ọjọ gbọọrọ, ẹ si ku aibeere ẹni.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àìbéére ẹni, ṣé bóṣe yẹ kó rí nìyẹn?.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku aibeere ẹni, ṣe boṣe yẹ ko ri niyẹn?.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kúàìbéére ẹni, àwá kúkú ń bère yín ní gbogbo ìgbà.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ kuaibeere ẹni, awa kuku n bere yin ni gbogbo igba.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àìbéére ẹni Iya Titó.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku aibeere ẹni Iya Tito.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àmójúba ọmọ tuntun yìí.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku amojuba ọmọ tuntun yii.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àmójúbà iná o.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku amojuba ina o.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àmójúbà wa ẹ̀yin olólùfẹ wa.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku amojuba wa ẹyin ololufẹ wa.

Original Sentence: Ẹ káàsán ìya wa, ẹ kú àmójúbà ọmọ yín.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ kaasan iya wa, ẹ ku amojuba ọmọ yin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú oríire o, ẹ sì kú àmójúbà àwọn èyan yín.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku oriire o, ẹ si ku amojuba awọn eyan yin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìjókòó, ẹ sì kú àpèjẹ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ijokoo, ẹ si ku apejẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìnáwó o, ẹ sì kú àpèjẹ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku inawo o, ẹ si ku apejẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun tí ẹ pè mí bàbá, ẹ kú àpèjẹ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun ti ẹ pe mi baba, ẹ ku apejẹ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àpèjẹ, ìná ò ní tánwó yín.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku apejẹ, ina o ni tanwo yin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àpèjẹ ẹ̀yin olóyè.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku apejẹ ẹyin oloye.

Original Sentence: Àjẹkì ni tòní, ẹ kú àsè.
Modified Sentence: Ajẹki ni toni, ẹ ku ase.

Original Sentence: Òórùn oúnjẹ yín ló gba gbogbo ilé kan yìí, ẹ kú àsè.
Modified Sentence: Oorun ounjẹ yin lo gba gbogbo ile kan yii, ẹ ku ase.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú asè, ẹ ṣáà má já wa nímú.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ase, ẹ ṣaa ma ja wa nimu.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àsè ẹ̀yin alásè wa.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ase ẹyin alase wa.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àsè, ẹ sè é kó dùn.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ase, ẹ se e ko dun.

Original Sentence: Mo dúpẹ́ o, ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn.
Modified Sentence: Mo dupẹ o, ẹ ku atilẹyin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun, ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun, ẹ ku atilẹyin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun tí ẹ wá, ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ṣeun ti ẹ wa, ẹ ku atilẹyin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn mi, irú ẹ̀ lẹ ó fi gbà á.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku atilẹyin mi, iru ẹ lẹ o fi gba a.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn bàba Ẹwà, mo mọ rírì yin.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku atilẹyin baba Ẹwa, mo mọ riri yin.

Original Sentence: Kábíyèsi!́ Aláṣẹ ìkejì òrìṣà, ẹ kú oríkádún.
Modified Sentence: Kabiyesi! Alaṣẹ ikeji oriṣa, ẹ ku orikadun.

Original Sentence: O kú oríkádún ọ̀rẹ́ mi, wà á ṣe ọ̀pọ̀ ọdún láyé.
Modified Sentence: O ku orikadun ọrẹ mi, wa a ṣe ọpọ ọdun laye.

Original Sentence: Mo báa yín yọ̀, ẹ kú oríkádún, ọ̀pọ rẹ̀ lẹ ó ṣe.
Modified Sentence: Mo baa yin yọ, ẹ ku orikadun, ọpọ rẹ lẹ o ṣe.

Original Sentence: O kú oríkádún ọlọ́jọ́ ìbí, o ò ní sọnù.
Modified Sentence: O ku orikadun ọlọjọ ibi, o o ni sọnu.

Original Sentence: Ẹ bá mi kí wọn, wọ́n kú oríkádún.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ba mi ki wọn, wọn ku orikadun.

Original Sentence: Ẹ pẹ̀lẹ́, ẹ kú ìrọ́jú.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ pẹlẹ, ẹ ku irọju.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú, ọlọ́hun á kó o yín yọ.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku irọju, ọlọhun a ko o yin yọ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú, ọlọ́hun yóò rán aláànú síi yín.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku irọju, ọlọhun yoo ran alaanu sii yin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú, ìgbà ọ̀tun yóò dé.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku irọju, igba ọtun yoo de.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú bàbá àgbà, a ò ní rí irú rẹ̀ mọ́.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku irọju baba agba, a o ni ri iru rẹ mọ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú àjàbọ́, a ò ní rí irú rẹ̀ mọ́.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ajabọ, a o ni ri iru rẹ mọ.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú oríire, ẹ sì kú àjàbọ́.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku oriire, ẹ si ku ajabọ.

Original Sentence: Orí ló kóo yín yọ o, ẹ kú àjàbọ́.
Modified Sentence: Ori lo koo yin yọ o, ẹ ku ajabọ.

Original Sentence: Oríyọmí lorúkọ yín, ẹ kú àjàbọ́.
Modified Sentence: Oriyọmi lorukọ yin, ẹ ku ajabọ.

Original Sentence: O kú àjàbọ́ ọ̀rẹ́ mi.
Modified Sentence: O ku ajabọ ọrẹ mi.

Original Sentence: Olóòtọ́ ènìyàn ni yín, ẹ kú ìfarajìn.
Modified Sentence: Olootọ eniyan ni yin, ẹ ku ifarajin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìfarajì ẹ̀yin ọmọ lẹ́yìn Jésù.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ifaraji ẹyin ọmọ lẹyin Jesu.

Original Sentence: Sí ẹ̀yin òṣìṣẹ wa pàtàkì, ẹ kú ìfarajìn.
Modified Sentence: Si ẹyin oṣiṣẹ wa pataki, ẹ ku ifarajin.

Original Sentence: Ẹ kú ìfarajìn, ọlọ́run yóò san yín lẹ́san.
Modified Sentence: Ẹ ku ifarajin, ọlọrun yoo san yin lẹsan.

Original Sentence: Gbogbo ìgbìyànju yín ni ọlọ́run rí, ẹ kú ìfarajìn.
Modified Sentence: Gbogbo igbiyanju yin ni ọlọrun ri, ẹ ku ifarajin.
